title: Updated Client Open Beta - Useful Links
body:
Hi Folks

With the Open Beta starting for OCE today, here are a couple of links that will be good resources for info if you have any issues or questions.

[Open Beta FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230175788)
[Known Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/231536768)

Cheers
Mindstar

replies.body: Would be nice if you guys used the forums that are made for feedback on the new client
